message: Oh, and Kelly: meh
It feels like day one was a bit *off*, but I'm really looking forward to the new long-term/macro-oriented maps with some of the better players later on.
Day 1 of Code S was awesome though.  The July vs MVP series was great
I don't mind Kelly, though I'm not particularly fond of her either
Huk played pretty well in code A. Luckily has opponent made as many mistakes as he did in G1. Good luck to Haypro tonight ^^
SlayerSYugiOh vs  Leenock should be good too
also, just now watched MarineKingPrime's first TvZ game with the double expand into mass mech, amazing game
I wonder how far sanZenith will go, he's looking great
hope you guys are watching right now
soooooo excited for july v nada
man Nada is giving me a heart attack
yeah, i watched it live yesterday.  felt like BW of old.  soooo good.
TL.net sent me here ^^ Great site! Last night matches of Nada and July were so nostalgic!
despite the close matches, really felt like July zerg was in control the whole time
yeah it is, would be even cooler if more people signed up
Nada couldn't do much besides defend
this place is cool!
@yunchang sweet.  Do you have a link to where they were talking about convore on TL?
nvm, just found the post.  And I agree, more people would only make this place cooler
good voice, but not as cool/funny as tasteless or artosis
not a big fan of this new caster, DoA

JulyZerg has such a great (aggressive) style of play. If IdrA played more like him (rather than completely macro based) then it would keep opponents guessing (Is he gonna all in me?), he would get much better results.

@lastkarrde I agree JulyZerg is a ton of fun to watch, but his play style seems to be his own.  I think play style is something you arrive at, not something you can try to emulate -- what works for JZ might not work for Idra.  Although I do agree that having a larger number of builds under your belt keeps your opponent guessing.
What an awesome Ro16 and Ro8 it's been!
Good games tonight, and it's nice that the broadcast isn't at some insane hour.  I can watch GSL and get good sleep too :-)
agreed
These are gunna be the sickest finals ever too
Pumped for the finals!  This has probably been my favorite season so far -- awesome matches in every pairing.
MVP to Code A.  Wow.
@dz Yeah, there are so many really really good players in Code A.
Watching the live stream to see MC and July face off!
